6.3. Date and Time TypesÂ¶

ITTIA DB IoT provides a timestamp to represent a moment in time: containing both a date and time with six digits of fractional seconds precision.

The date part of any date and time type must be valid according to the Gregorian calendar. The time part is restricted to a range from 00:00:00 to 23:59:59.999999, inclusive.
